roleset.name: go on vacation

example.name: just arg1
example.text: you 've got to remember that when the Kursk went down , he was on vacation in the Black Sea

example.text: During his summer vacation in the first year of filming , Mayaw went to live in Lukar 's home .

example.text: Hillary Clinton 's desperation " gas vacation " proposal is about the last straw with me .
